hello
if you want only download web pages with content type "text  & html"=
 you should 
set the following instruction:
define the rule "ContentTypeNot=
MatchesRegExpDecideRule" in the part 
"midfetch-decide-rule" and set ".*tex=
t/html.*" for Regexpr
and for decision set Regect


--0-86635422-1283024060=:31514
